name: B612
description: In the strong wind and waves, the little prince and the fox took a boat to the lost island of planet B612, where there were remnants of other human beings, pink rocks and wild roses. The boat was damaged during the voyage, and the little prince decided to live on this lost island for a while and plant his favorite roses. A lost desert island, a life rediscovered. In the end, the little prince will find his rose again, restore his ship, and set sail again.
